mapper.select: SELECT m.doctor_id AS role_id, d.doctor_name AS role_name FROM msg m, doctor d WHERE m.is_del = 0 AND m.client_id = #{clientId} AND d.doctor_id = m.doctor_id ORDER BY m.create_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT msg_id, (CASE is_client WHEN 0 THEN d.doctor_name ELSE c.client_name END) AS role_name, (CASE is_client WHEN 0 THEN d.doctor_photo ELSE c.client_photo END) AS role_photo, is_client AS is_mine, msg_content, is_img, m.create_time FROM msg m, client c, doctor d WHERE m.is_del = 0 AND m.client_id = #{clientId} AND m.doctor_id = #{doctorId} AND m.client_id = c.client_id AND m.doctor_id = d.doctor_id

SELECT IF(m.doctor_id = #{doctorId}, 0, 1) AS flag, m.doctor_id, d.doctor_name FROM msg m, doctor d WHERE client_id = #{clientId} AND m.doctor_id = d.doctor_id GROUP BY m.doctor_id -- 连接当前的医生 UNION SELECT 0 AS flag, d.doctor_id, d.doctor_name FROM doctor d WHERE d.doctor_id = #{doctorId} ORDER BY flag -- 最后进行排序
SELECT m.client_id AS role_id, c.client_name AS role_name FROM msg m, client c WHERE m.is_del = 0 AND m.doctor_id = #{doctorId} AND m.client_id = c.client_id ORDER BY m.create_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT msg_id, (CASE is_client WHEN 0 THEN d.doctor_name ELSE c.client_name END) AS role_name, (CASE is_client WHEN 0 THEN d.doctor_photo ELSE c.client_photo END) AS role_photo, NOT is_client AS is_mine, msg_content, is_img, m.create_time FROM msg m, client c, doctor d WHERE m.is_del = 0 AND m.client_id = #{clientId} AND m.doctor_id = #{doctorId} AND m.client_id = c.client_id AND m.doctor_id = d.doctor_id

SELECT if(m.client_id = #{clientId}, 0, 1) AS flag, m.client_id AS role_id, c.client_name AS role_name FROM msg m, client c WHERE m.doctor_id = #{doctorId} AND m.client_id = c.client_id GROUP BY role_id ORDER BY flag
